name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a malicious script that escalated privileges and attempted to exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--26a2d655-e2c5-4094-83d4-cbde12a4.name: Kill malicious process
action--26a2d655-e2c5-4094-83d4-cbde12a4.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--aeca6bf0-1fd0-4cec-84df-6b3a1f43.name: Remove malicious script
action--aeca6bf0-1fd0-4cec-84df-6b3a1f43.description: Delete the malicious script from the system.

parallel--103ea587-7d6e-4d27-acae-d318f9.name: Perform additional mitigations
parallel--103ea587-7d6e-4d27-acae-d318f9.description: Execute multiple additional actions in parallel to remediate the incident.

action--f8e5317b-a4a5-42d8-b267-57ce1db9.name: Block external IP
action--f8e5317b-a4a5-42d8-b267-57ce1db9.description: Block any outbound connections to the identified malicious external IP address.

action--f7ab58ee-4451-4d5d-b07d-093c2879.name: Reset all user passwords
action--f7ab58ee-4451-4d5d-b07d-093c2879.description: Change passwords for all user accounts to prevent further access.

commands.command: for USER in $(cat /etc/passwd | cut -d':' -f1); do echo 'new_password' | passwd --stdin $USER; done

action--47fcef48-3137-4ca5-9bc2-cfb9f62c.name: Scan system for remaining threats
action--47fcef48-3137-4ca5-9bc2-cfb9f62c.description: Run a malware scan to identify any remaining threats.

scan_result.description: The output of the malware scan

action--304d6910-2aa3-445e-9b58-8c9f07f1.name: Enable script restrictions
action--304d6910-2aa3-445e-9b58-8c9f07f1.description: Set execution policy to restricted to prevent script execution.
